Detailed Description

The OSMNode class is used to handle data relating to nodes on a map. This class is used for nodes such as POI's and Town/City markers, but is also used as part of the OSMWay and OSMRelation classes to hold the nodes that make up different ways and relations.

void OSMNode::setRelated ( bool  related  ) 

Set whether the node is part of a way or relation. If it is related to a way or relation, it will be rendered on the map as part of that way or relation instead of independently as a POI

Parameters:
related True if the node is related to a way or relation
